proposals.title: Funding Proposals
proposals.creator: Creator
proposals.text: Workers are a unique concept to Bitshares. They are proposals to provide services in return for a salary from the blockchain itself. A proposal should include a link to a website or forum thread that explains the purpose of the proposal, a collection of proposals can be found here

votes.name: Name
votes.creator: Ersteller
votes.already: Konto befindet sich bereits in der Liste

proxy_tab.help_note: After adding or removing a Proxy, you must Publish Changes to confirm
proxy_tab.question_mark_note: As a PPY holder, you can proxy your voting stake to whatever Peerplays account you choose. If you wish to support the network but are unable to keep up with the day to day activities, simply proxy your vote to another trusted Peerplays account holder. By proxying your vote, this means your votes will be cast for the same Witness and Advisor candidates as the account to which you have proxied. You can add or remove a proxy account at any time.

witnesses_tab.help_note_1: Standby witnesses are not shown in this wallet, but they still need your votes!
witnesses_tab.help_note_2:
Please search www.peerplaysdb.com/witnesses to discover your favorites, and then vote for them by typing
their Witness name and clicking the “ADD” button. After adding or removing witnesses from your list, please
select “PUBLISH CHANGES” to confirm your vote.
witnesses_tab.question_mark_note: Witnesses are elected network node operators who verify the validity of transactions on the Peerplays network and bundle them into blocks. Witnesses must operate a node with enough bandwidth to support current network activities, and must analyze and make decisions about potential code forks. Witnesses are also responsible for publishing data feeds with the results of sports games and wagering events. As a PPY holder, you are in charge of voting for Witnesses to perform these tasks, and removing your vote if they fail to perform.

advisors_tab.help_note: After adding or removing Advisors, you must Publish Changes to confirm
advisors_tab.question_mark_note: Advisors are elected Peerplays account holders who can adjust certain fees and global parameters of the blockchain by consensus vote. As a PPY holder, you are in charge of voting for Advisors to perform these tasks, and removing your vote if they fail to perform.

about.title: Peerplays TEST Network
about.note1: Dieses öffentliche TEST-Netzwerk ist für Vorführungen bestimmt. Es wird geändert und verändert sobald zusätzliche Funktionen hinzugefügt und getestet sind.
about.note2: A graphic interface, similar to that which is demonstrated on this TEST network, will  be made available upon the launch of the Peerplays blockchian as a downloadable desktop app.
about.note3: Here are some of the features you will find this TEST network:

transfer.warn_name_unable_read_memo: Warning: %(name)s will be unable to read this memo
transfer.select_coin_or_token: Bitte wählen Sie die Münze oder das Token aus, die Sie senden möchten

errors.balance: Ihr abschließendes Guthaben kann nicht negativ sein!

login.signup_form_title: Bitte erstellen Sie Ihr neues Konto:

login_backup_text.line1: Peerplays basiert auf einer dezentralen Blockchain, sodass niemand ohne Ihre Erlaubnis auf Ihr Konto zugreifen kann. Dies bedeutet, dass Sie Ihre eigene Backup-Wiederherstellungsdatei behalten müssen.
login_backup_text.line2: Wenn Sie Ihr Kennwort vergessen oder wenn Ihr Computer abstürzt, ist die einzige Möglichkeit, den Zugriff auf Ihr Konto wiederherzustellen, mit Ihrer Sicherungsdatei. Um diese Datei zu erstellen, schreiben Sie bitte 3 Sicherheitsfragen und beantworten Sie diese.
login_backup_text.line3: Wenn Sie einige Vorschläge für Sicherheitsfragen benötigen, finden Sie Beispiele

For all other PPY balance claims,
Sign up and then go to Settings/Balance Claims

login_bts.title: PEERPLAYS UIA and BTS Sharedrop Balance Claims
login_bts.note_1: If you held PEERPLAYS UIA tokens in your BitShares wallet on or after 4:00 UTC on December 26, 2016, enter your BitShares private owner key below to claim your PPY balance.
login_bts.note_2: If you held BTS tokens in your BitShares wallet on September 2, 2016 at 16:37 UTC (BitShares block number 9,291,600), enter your BitShares private owner key below to claim your PPY balance.
login_bts.note_3: For all other PPY token redemptions, please “sign up” below, and then go to settings/balance claims and enter your redemption key.

sign_up.note1: If you lose your password, you will lose all of your funds!
sign_up.note3: Um eine Textdatei Ihres Passwortes herunterzuladen, klicken sie bitte den unten stehenden Link:
sign_up.pseudoText1: Ich verstehe, dass Peerplays verlorene Passwörter nicht wiederherstellen kann
sign_up.pseudoText2: Ich habe mein generiertes Passwort sicher gespeichert
sign_up.already_have_account: Sie haben bereits ein Konto? Gehe zu %(login_link)s

help.title: Help
help.important_note: PLEASE REMEMBER TO SECURELY STORE YOUR WALLET PASSWORD. IF YOU LOSE YOUR PASSWORD, YOU WILL LOSE ACCESS TO YOUR WALLET AND FUNDS PERMANENTLY.
help.introduce_note: You can log out of the Peerplays Core wallet by going to My Funds and clicking on your Account Name at the top right side of the screen.

my_funds.title: My Funds
my_funds.note_1: This is the main dashboard of the Peerplays Core wallet.

balances.text_1: This is where you can view your digital assets in your Peerplays wallet. These assets are broken into three categories:
balances.text_2: PPY tokens - the core token of Peerplays
balances.text_4: Other Assets - User-Issued Asset tokens and gateway tokens

recent_activity.text_1: This data feed shows the latest transactions you have made with your Peerplays account, including sending funds, receiving funds, and voting for witnesses.

send.text_1: Click the Send button at the top right of the My Funds page to send funds from your wallet.

overview.text_1: On the right-hand side of the My Funds page, you will find an overview of your Available Balances and Vesting Balances.
overview.text_2: Please note: Vesting Balances (and the Claim Balances button) is only for use by Witness Node operators to claim their Witness pay.
overview.text_3: The top of the overview panel shows your Peerplays Wallet Account Name. You can click on this name to Logout of your wallet - but always make sure you have your username and password securely stored before logging out!

play.title: PLAY
play.text_1: The Play page will link to the various Peerplays Dapps (Decentralized apps) as they become available.

vote.title: VOTE
vote.note_1: If you hold PPY tokens, then here is where you can vote for Witnesses and Advisors, or set a Proxy account to vote for you.

proxy.text_1: You can utilize the Proxy function to copy the voting patterns of another Peerplays account. The Proxy function is ideal for those PPY holders who wish to be involved in governance of the Peerplays blockchain but would rather step back from day-to-day decision-making and put the voting power of their PPY tokens behind a trusted proxy voter. This trusted voter cannot access or move your funds, but instead your account will simply match their voting patterns.
proxy.text_2: To set a Proxy you should enter the Peerplays Account Name of that user, and select “set proxy”. Your account will then automatically begin to vote for the same witnesses and advisors as the proxy account.
proxy.text_3: You can also remove the proxy at any time. Removing the proxy will enable you to resume voting for individual witnesses and advisors.

witness.text_1: This is where you vote for Peerplays Witnesses. Witnesses maintain the Peerplays blockchain by Bundling transactions into blocks and verifying the validity of transactions.
witness.li_1: To vote for a Witness, click the ADD button next to that Witness (as many as you like), then click PUBLISH CHANGES button, and CONFIRM.
witness.li_2: To remove your vote from a Witness, click the REMOVE button next to that Witness, then click PUBLISH CHANGES button (enter password first time only), and CONFIRM.

advisors.text_1: This is where you vote for Peerplays Advisors. Advisors govern parameters such as specific fee rates on the Peerplays network (all changes require consensus vote by the advisors) in order to keep Peerplays flexible and competitive in changing market conditions.
advisors.li_1: To vote for an Advisor, click the ADD button next to that Advisor (as many as you like), then click PUBLISH CHANGES button, and CONFIRM.
advisors.li_2: To remove your vote from an Advisor, click the REMOVE button next to that Advisor, then click PUBLISH CHANGES button (enter password first time only), and CONFIRM.

network.title: NETWORK
network.note_1: The Network page has three tabs: The Blockchain, Accounts, and Fee Schedule.

blockchain.note: This tab gives an overview of the state of the Peerplays blockchain including recent transactions.

accounts.note: The Accounts tab allows you to search for Peerplays accounts by Account Name.

fee.note: Many transactions on the Peerplays blockchain (for example voting, sending funds, becoming a witness) have an associated fee. The Fee Schedule is shown here. All Fees are quoted in PPY.

settings.title: Settings
settings.note_1: The Setting page has two tabs: API Access and Balance Claim.

api_access.note: This feature allows you to select the API node that your wallet communicates with the blockchain. If the wallet ever has trouble connecting or begins to operate slowly, you can troubleshoot by changing the API node that your wallet is accessing.

claim.link: This tab is where PPY token holders can claim their balances

help.title: Help
help.note: This is where you are right now!
help.link_pdf: How to claim your PPY Tokens

notifications.title: NOTIFICATIONS
notifications.note: This section notifies you when there is a new update of the Peerplays core wallet app. available for you to download.
